column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm not a true deep dish lover
column2: and Lou's was never my favorite. With that being said
column3: they are consistent and reasonably priced when it comes to the Chicago deep dish game. Their beer selection is lacking
column4: and if you want something besides pizza
column5: I would consider going elsewhere. I've grown to appreciate their pizza. Therefore
column6: I would recommend Lou's to new comers.
